entries.text: The tiny porch series is such a unique and exciting way for artists to showcase their talent and for fans to experience the music. Because of its ‘block party’ feel, the fans and artists are together on the same plane and able to interact and share the experience in a way that doesn’t happen on a stage in a club. The hosts are amazing and warm. The whole neighborhood is engaged and the feeling of community and love is absolutely palpable. If you have the chance to play or attend in some way, don’t pass it up.
entries.author: Hansi Armentrout

entries.text: The Tiny Porch concerts fill a void in a Richmond music scene that does not always serve the smaller local musicians. I had a blast playing for this community of listeners.
entries.author: Burke Ingraffia

entries.text: The neighborhood shows up, listens, dances, and tips well. What more can you ask for?
entries.author: Brookhouse

entries.text: We had an amazing experience playing in Woodland Heights. What makes it special is the community y'all have built. Y'all were communicative and courteous. We felt welcomed and appreciated. Y'all went above and beyond to promote and share our art. Y'all made sure we had the right equipment and helped us load in and out. We'd love to play there again!
entries.author: Squeeze the Squid

entries.text: Who knew we had so many talented neighbors!? There's just nothing more special than enjoying the musical gifts of our friends in the streets or yards of our beautiful little neighborhood. Tiny Porch is an incredibly rich part of our community and so incredibly well organized.
entries.author: Nathan Saxman
